name: Powered Labs, Inc.
tagline: Design, Develop, Amplify. We help enterprises grow
description:
Powered Labs is a software developer specializing in custom applications for enterprise-level companies. We design, develop and amplify solutions for our clients so they can improve their business processes and accelerate their company's growth.
From custom CMS, CRM, ERP, and legacy software integrations, we create new technologies to bring our clients into the future.
We are self-described "Platform Agnostic," "Agile-ish" - and everything we do begins with design. From ideating and executing a new brand identity system for your enterprise, building a custom software application or legacy conversion, or designing an award-winning social media campaign or advertisement — good design is the mastery of putting form and content together. 
We offer world-class design and application development among other services that include:
Social Media Marketing & Management
Reputation Management
Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
AdWords, Bing Ads, PPC, Display and Remarketing Advertising
Email Marketing
Influencer Marketing
Public Relations & Event Promotion
Web Design
Branding / Print Media
Game Development
Augmented Reality / Internet of Things / Cryptocurrency / Blockchain Strategy and Development
READ MORE...
